REQUEST¶

Contains method, which use HTTP request’s

pet_store.rest_request.request.get(url, headers)[source]¶

Wrapper post get request.

Parameters:
  • url – host URL
  • headers – headers for request
Returns:

answer of get request
pet_store.rest_request.request.post(url, data_xml, headers)[source]¶

Wrapper for post request.

Parameters:
  • url – host URL
  • data_xml – xml with necessary changes
  • headers – headers for request
Returns:

answer of post request
pet_store.rest_request.request.delete(url, headers)[source]¶

Wrapper for delete request.

Parameters:
  • url – host URL
  • headers – headers for request
Returns:

answer of delete request
